title: Statement by NSC Spokesperson Ned Price on the Explosion in Tianjin | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 13, 2015

 



Statement by NSC Spokesperson Ned Price on the Explosion in Tianjin





	At this time of tragedy, the United States extends its heartfelt condolences to the Chinese people over the deadly explosion that occurred on August 12 in Tianjin.Â  Our thoughts are with the victims and their families, and with China's first responders who are working to help those who were injured.
